TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ListSelectType extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

Docs.summary: Specifies how the selection list UI will be presented. This class cannot be inherited. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType> enumeration represents how a selection list will be rendered in a container, as a drop-down box, list box, set of options (radio buttons), and so on. In ASP.NET, you specify the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.SelectionList.SelectType%2A> property as one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType> enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType CheckBox = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Renders list items with check boxes and multiple selection capability. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType DropDown = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Renders list items in a drop-down list box. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType ListBox = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Renders list items in a list box. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType MultiSelectListBox = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Renders list items in a list box with multiple selection capability. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ListSelectType Radio = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Renders list items as options. This API is obsolete. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
